title: Step2 LifeStyle Custom Kitchen Review by Thrifty Nifty Mommy
description: Video review of the Step2 Lifestyle Custom Kitchen by blogger Thrifty Nifty Mommy.

asset.author: Step2
asset.description: Video review of the Step2 Lifestyle™ Custom Kitchen by blogger Thrifty Nifty Mommy. To view more, please visit http://thriftyniftymommy.com/

transcripts:
First, I wanted to say thank you to Step2 for sending me this kitchen set at no charge to participate in this review as a part of their ambassador program, This is the refrigerator. 

Is this the refrigerator? Yea

and there's ice water.

Yea? And what's this for?

in a cup.

In the microwave you do this.

Um yummy.
